result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Feliciano B Balboa

records.addlTxt: Preliminary hearing on November 11, 2022 at 03:00 pm.
Order for Appointment of an Attorney - Atty. Fischer
Order for Appointment of an Attorney - Atty. Fischer
Preliminary hearing on October 21, 2022 at 08:45 am.

2:35 PM.  Clerk - CRHI. 
ADA Shock appears on behalf of the State. 
22CF44 - Defendant Feliciano B Balboa appeared by phone.  Attorney Joseph Francis Fischer in court for Feliciano B Balboa. 
Cases 21CF490, 21CF618, 22CF19, 22CF41, 22CF222 and 22CT252 - Defendant Robert J. Meunier appears in person with Atty. Raff.
Court finds the phone connection to be sufficient for this hearing as it relates to Defendant Balboa.  

Court reviews cases history, status and filings relating to appointment of counsel for these Defendants. 
Court indicates that its appointment of Atty. Fischer for Mr. Balboa is a direct appointment.  
Court verifies that Atty. Raff is SPD appointed in all of these cases for Defendant Meunier. 

Court addresses scheduling in cases 22CF44 and 22CF41.  These two cases are continued for STC on 10/21/22 at 8:45am. 
Recess in these two cases only at 2:44pm.
Notice of Consent to Act
Status conference on September 13, 2022 at 02:00 pm.
Court's Response to Atty Fischer's 8/22/22 Letter
Letter from Atty Fischer re appointment
Status conference on September 12, 2022 at 02:30 pm.
The court appoints Atty Joe Fischer. COC will effectuate this upon Atty Fischer's consent.

[ml] Case called at 8:34AM
Defendant Feliciano B Balboa appeared in custody, by video from the Jackson Correctional Facility. ADA Krysta Parson appears for the State of Wisconsin.
This file is scheduled for a Preliminary Hearing, however the Court sets this matter over for another hearing due to the Defendant not having counsel.
On Motion of the State, the Court sets this matter over for a Status of Counsel.
On inquiry of the State, the Court states that the Defendant may appear by Zoom at the next scheduled hearing.

recess 8:37AM

NEXT: Status Conference on 09/12 at 2:30PM via Zoom (JA note in comments - this file is at the Preliminary Hearing
So ordered/directed [withdraw appointment]
Request to have Appointment Withdrawn due to Conflict
Preliminary hearing on August 16, 2022 at 08:30 am.

[ma] Case called at 9:00am  {This hearing is being conducted via Zoom videoconferencing.}
Defendant Feliciano B Balboa appears from Jackson Correctional, in custody.  Jeffrey Martin Shock appears for the State of Wisconsin.

The Court finds that the Zoom video conferencing system is sight and sound sufficient. 

The Court informs that counsel has been appointed for Mr. Balboa, but counsel is not able to appear due to conflict in existing calendaring. 

recess: 9:01am 
NEXT: JA to schedule next hearing
Status conference on July 18, 2022 at 09:00 am.
ec/pc: DA, Atty Campbell-Hunter, Def (7/5/22--ma)

[Court Reporter: Lisa Kwasigroch]
[ma] Case called at 11:36 AM 
Defendant Feliciano B Balboa appears via telephone from Jackson Correctional, in custody.   Krysta Parson appears for the State of Wisconsin.

The Court reviews court record; including that spd continues efforts to appoint counsel. 

Mr. Balboa confirms he wishes to have counsel. 

The Court appoints Attorney Campbell Hunter. 

recess: 11:40am 
NEXT: (1)Appoint Attorney Shunette Campbell-Hunter (2)Status on 7/18/22 at 9:00am
Status conference on July 5, 2022 at 11:30 am.

[MK] case called briefly at 2:41pm, and then at 2:52pm  
Defendant Feliciano B Balboa appears by Zoom-videoconferencing from Jackson Correctional Institution, in custody. ADA Theresa Beck appears for the State of Wisconsin.
The Court summarizes the Public Defender Office notices regarding efforts to find an available attorney to accept appointment as counsel. 
Mr. Balboa indicates that he continues to wish to be represented by counsel.
The Court directs that the Public Defender to continue efforts to appoint counsel. The Court may appoint counsel for Mr. Balboa.
recess 2:54pm 

NEXT:  Status Conference (status of counsel hearing) on July 5th at 11:30am --arrangements should be made for Mr. Balboa to appear by v/c from Jackson Correctional
Status of Counsel
Status conference on June 10, 2022 at 02:30 pm.

[ma] Case called at 2:22 PM 
Defendant Feliciano B Balboa appears via videoconferencing from Jackson Correctional, in custody.  Brookellen Teuber appeared for the State of Wisconsin.

The Court reviews the court record, directs SPD to continue efforts to appoint counsel.

recess: 2:33pm 
NEXT: Status of Counsel on 6/10/22 at 2:30pm (via video)
Status of Counsel
Status conference on May 17, 2022 at 02:00 pm. {*The hearing time has been changed from 2:30 PM (time provided in court) to 2:00 PM due to the availability of Jackson Correctional. -AR}

ADDRESS INFO for Feliciano B. Balboa
Current: PO Box 233, c/o Jackson Correctional Institution, Black River Falls, WI 54615-0233 United States  (Effective: 04-29-2022)
Prior: PO Box 700, c/o Dodge Correctional Institution, Waupun, WI 53963-0700 United States

[MK] case called at 10:05am 
Defendant Feliciano B Balboa appears via videoconferencing from Dodge Correctional Institution, in custody.  ADA Theresa Beck appears for the State of Wisconsin.
The Court verifies with Mr. Balboa that he can see and hear the proceedings through the video-connection. 
The Court notes that the Public Defendant has filed notice that Mr. Balboa qualifies for PD representation, but they have not been able to find an attorney to accept the appointment yet. The Court directs the Public Defender to continue efforts to appoint counsel for Mr. Balboa. The Court schedules another status conference in mid-May. 
recess 10:07am

NEXT:  Status Conference (JA-note in calendar comments that case is at prelim stage) on May 17th at 2:30pm with arrangements made for Mr. Balboa to appear by video (Mr. Balboa indicated during the hearing that he anticipates transfer from DCI to another prison facility within the next two weeks; he has not been told yet which facility it will be)
Status conference on April 25, 2022 at 10:00 am.

[MK] cases #22CF44, #21CF170, #22CF18, #22CF46, #22CF19, #22CF41 called at 1:47pm. 
Co- Defendant Feliciano B Balboa appears via videoconferencing from Dodge Correctional Institution, in custody. 
Co-Defendant Tiffany K Debord appears in court. 
Co-Defendant Robert J Meunier appears in court.
DA Monica Hall appears for the State of Wisconsin.

The Court finds the video-connection to be sight and sound sufficient. 
DA Hall verifies victim rights compliance.  
The Court confirms with each of the three Co-Defendants that they wish to have representation by counsel.  
The Court finds good cause to toll time limits.  The Court directs that the Public Defender is to continue efforts to appoint counsel.
Ms. Debord verifies that the 209 E. Cady Street, Watertown 53094 address is current. 
Mr. Meunier verifies that the 1005 Clement Street, Apt. A Watertown 53094 address is current.
recess 1:52pm
  
NEXT:  Status Conference April 25th at 10:00am --arrangements should be made for Mr. Balboa to appear by videoconferencing for this hearing
Status of Counsel
Scheduling Order
Status conference on March 24, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Notice of Court Order to Jefferson County Dispatch

ADDRESS INFO for Feliciano B. Balboa
Current: PO Box 700, c/o Dodge Correctional Institution, Waupun, WI 53963-0700 United States  (Effective: 03-08-2022)
Prior: PO Box 661, Dodge Correctional Inst., Waupun, WI 53963 United States

[ae] case called 10:46 AM Defendant Feliciano B Balboa appeared by telephone in custody from Dodge Correctional. ADA Michaels appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
The Defendant verifies that the address and date of birth listed on the Criminal Complaint are correct. 
Service of Complaint admitted, reading waived, the charges and maximum penalties are recited
Right to counsel is given.  
Preliminary Hearing time limits are waived by both parties.
The Court finds probable cause to exist in the Criminal Complaint.

The Court requires $5000 Signature Bond, with conditions:
--no contact with co-defendants except in the presence of an attorney or in court
--no possession or consumption of controlled substances without a valid prescription;  to take prescription medications only as prescribed
--no possession of any drug paraphernalia

recess 10:53 am
NEXT: (1) Status of Counsel on 3/24/22 at 1:30 pm [Clerk is to notify SPD defendant is requesting paperwork]
SPD Status of Counsel
Initial appearance on March 7, 2022 at 10:30 am.
NOTE: Copy of complaint mailed to Feliciano at Dodge Correctional Inst. on 02/21/2022. (NMS)
